column5: Home is conveniently located, walking distance from great unique restaurants and special shops on landmark Heights 19th street. Minutes away from downtown & Galleria. Very short and convenient commute to Medical Center, Museum District, Energy Corredor as there are accesses to several major highways very close. You will have a Private bedroom, located on the bottom floor of a 3 story home. Quiet, elegant, clean and comfy; Queen bedroom set, internet, cable, private bathroom and walking closet.
column8: Walking distance from great shops and restaurants
